com.apple.eawt.event
Interface MagnificationListener

All Superinterfaces:
java.util.EventListener, GestureListener
All Known Implementing Classes:
GestureAdapter
public interface MagnificationListener
extends GestureListener

Listener interface for receiving magnification events.

Since:
Java for Mac OS X 10.5 Update 7, Java for Mac OS X 10.6 Update 2
See Also:
MagnificationEvent, GesturePhaseListener, GestureUtilities

Method Summary
 void magnify(MagnificationEvent e)
          Invoked when a magnification gesture is performed by the user.
 

Method Detail

magnify

void magnify(MagnificationEvent e)
Invoked when a magnification gesture is performed by the user.

Parameters:
event - containing the scale of the magnification.
